title: Cant undo lock screen
body: Alright so I just played almost an entire game with lock screen and no matter what I did I couldnt undo it (worst experience ever btw...) At the very end it managed to unlock, I have no idea how. Is there any tips on how to fix this problem if it ever happens again?

replies.body:
That's pretty weird that it force locked all game until the very end o_O. Try giving your config settings a quick reset following the steps below, but hit me back up if that doesn't help!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
